argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscld.1 | |- X = U. J |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ntrfval | |- ( J e. Top -> ( int ` J ) = ( x e. ~P X |-> U. ( J i^i ~P x ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( J e. Top -> ( ( int ` J ) ` S ) = ( ( x e. ~P X |-> U. ( J i^i ~P x ) ) ` S ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( int ` J ) ` S ) = ( ( x e. ~P X |-> U. ( J i^i ~P x ) ) ` S ) ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_topopn | |- ( J e. Top -> X e. J ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elpw2g | |- ( X e. J -> ( S e. ~P X <-> S C_ X ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( J e. Top -> ( S e. ~P X <-> S C_ X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_biimpar | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> S e. ~P X ) |
| 9 |  | #P_inex1g | |- ( J e. Top -> ( J i^i ~P S ) e. _V ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( J i^i ~P S ) e. _V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_uniexg | |- ( ( J i^i ~P S ) e. _V -> U. ( J i^i ~P S ) e. _V ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> U. ( J i^i ~P S ) e. _V ) |
| 13 |  | #P_pweq | |- ( x = S -> ~P x = ~P S ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_ineq2d | |- ( x = S -> ( J i^i ~P x ) = ( J i^i ~P S ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_unieqd | |- ( x = S -> U. ( J i^i ~P x ) = U. ( J i^i ~P S ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. ~P X |-> U. ( J i^i ~P x ) ) = ( x e. ~P X |-> U. ( J i^i ~P x ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_fvmptg | |- ( ( S e. ~P X /\ U. ( J i^i ~P S ) e. _V ) -> ( ( x e. ~P X |-> U. ( J i^i ~P x ) ) ` S ) = U. ( J i^i ~P S ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 12, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( x e. ~P X |-> U. ( J i^i ~P x ) ) ` S ) = U. ( J i^i ~P S ) ) |
| 19 | 4, 18 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( int ` J ) ` S ) = U. ( J i^i ~P S ) ) |
